title: YOU CAN'T DO THAT ON TELEVISON DVD Disc 1 of 12 (ISO)
description:
YOU CAN&#039;T DO THAT ON TELEVISION
DISC 1 OF 12

Sometime near the end of 2006, while perusing the internet for some way of acquiring episodes of YCDTOTV I came across a website that offered every episode of the show on 12 DVD-Rs for the low, low price of $60.  I&#039;m pretty sure the site that I stumbled upon is gone now, because I searched for it so I could provide a link in this description and could not find it.  The site was upfront about it being on DVD-Rs, and that the source were VHS tapes.  So going into it I wasn&#039;t fooling myself into thinking I was getting digitally remastered copies or something.  I figured it would be like watching old VHS tapes.  I could handle paying $60 for old VHS tapes of every episode, why not digital copies?  Well, I got the set a couple days later and found the quality to be somewhat lower than actual old VHS tapes.  Some episodes are unwatchable, but many are actually fairly decent.  So why am I uploading this set?  Well, one reason is that I&#039;ve never seen any episodes of YCDTOTV offered on any torrent site.  Another reason is because maybe someone with better quality copies will see some of these and think, "maybe I should upload my higher quality versions."  Yet another reason is because maybe that site is still around, charging good people $60 a pop for shitty workmanship. Download it for free here.  Upload it somewhere else.  Spread this around.
 

I&#039;d like to mention that the website www.barthsburgery.com offers quality DVDs of the show, just not of every episode.  Check them out if you have the time.  


DISC 1
1  CJOH Shoestring
2  Exectuive Washrooms
3  St. Patrick&#039;s Day
4  Work
5  Transportaion
6  Strike Now
7  Dating
8  Fitness
9  Safety First
